objects.text:
• Noise Reduction Technology
• Deep Rich Bass
• Cushioned Comfort Design
• Built-in Microphone

product_details.description: Noise Reduction Technology: High Definition Stereo Headphones, noise reduction technology designed to reduce surrounding noise so that you can enjoy what you want to hear. Lose yourself in music even in the lowest volume levels! 40mm sound driver for true richness in sound and deep bass. EASY CONNECTIVITY: Gabba Goods Headphones are compatible with all Bluetooth or 3.5mm plug cable enabled devices such as , iPhones, Smart android phones, Tablet, Laptop, iPads, MP3/4 Player, Computers, MacBook and other Bluetooth devices. Just slide the on/off button and the headphones will be in ready to pair mode. It is built to provide a quick and stable Bluetooth connection and to enable hands-free communication through our special noise reduction technology Super Comfortable design: The Cushioned Ear Muffs are made of artificial leather so that you can wear them for extended time with comfort. The Headset is foldable for easy storage and travel. Great for use by Unisex Kids, Teens and Adults. Built-in microphone: For clear hands-free calling. Enjoy Speaking and Talking Handsfree A highly sensitive microphone that is perfect for capturing clear audio, Micro SD card support: And volume and pause/play functions , allows you to conveniently Listen to Your Favorite Music Audio books, and Podcasts. Brand - Gabba Goods ** Color - Lavender ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Impedance - 26 Ohm **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern product advertisement with a futuristic aesthetic, using bold typography and clean layout to highlight wireless headphones. The background consists of a dynamic diagonal split — one half with a deep purple gradient and the other a soft lavender, enriched with abstract lines and translucent circles adding a sense of depth. The top-left corner includes a bold, techno-style title ("heading") followed by a subheading ("subheading") in futuristic, sleek font. Below is a four-point feature list ("description") describing the product benefits. The bottom-left highlights the price in bold, large font ("price") and a rounded call-to-action button ("cta_button") with a complementary label ("cta") encouraging interaction. A high-resolution headphone image ("product_image") positioned on the right balances the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Purple: #4B0082
- Mid Purple: #663399
- Light Lavender: #E6E6FA
- Thistle: #D8BFD8
- Soft Purple: #9370DB
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases over-ear headphones in a sleek, pastel lavender aesthetic, offering a modern and stylish look. The primary color is a glossy soft lavender (#C8A7E0), providing a calming and sophisticated feel, making it ideal for lifestyle-focused ad banners. Accents of deeper purple (#7F5BA4) are used within the ear padding and button details, adding depth and contrast. Lighter lilac tones (#E5D2F3) highlight the edges and inner bands, enhancing visual dimension. The colors transition smoothly with subtle gloss and shadow effects, giving a polished, high-end finish. This carefully coordinated palette reinforces elegance and contemporary tech fashion.
